pageContext.claim: “2019 HOLIDAY RETAIL SALES WERE UP 3.4% FROM LAST YEAR, THE BIGGEST NUMBER IN U.S. HISTORY.”
pageContext.analysis: E-commerce holiday sales were the highest in history, according to Mastercard SpendingPulse, but this tweet is wrong. U.S. holiday retail sales in 2018 had recorded its strongest growth in the past six years, increasing 5.1 percent to more than $850 billion.
